subject: Figure Skating
Ratings and Rating Systems
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Critics of the point-based scoring system for figure skating find it to be overly nitpicking. Mirai Nagasu’s artistic but second-place performance Saturday highlighted that.
snippet: Critics of the point-based scoring system for figure skating find it to be overly nitpicking. Mirai Nagasu’s artistic but second-place performance Saturday highlighted that.
